TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nipaluma-swantin, title = nipaluma-swantin, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-swantin} }

S.FORM: == swantin == 酸藤 . swantin u kaazihay a nipaluma i hekal, maydih tu cilal. mikalic i zuma a kilang, tayza katukuh ipabaw nu kilang. sibalu i 5-6 bulad. anu maazih ku sumanahay a balu i buyu', kay unu balu nu swantin. anu masuaw kisu, taneng kisu mitanam kya papah, cilemin. adidi' ku balu. muculil i zazan nu buyu'sa, anu maazih sumanahay a balu, izaw tu ku swantin ipabaw. anu masepi kisu, taneng kisu maazih kulemi tanaya' a heci. mapela' ku heci sa, mabahel tu ku sibanuhay a sapaluma, katukuh i lala'. u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu-Hulam atu Amilika

== swantin == 酸藤 . swantin o kaazihay a nipaloma i hekal, maydih to cilal. mikalic i zoma a kilang, tayza katokoh ipabaw no kilang. sibalo i 5-6 bolad. ano maazih ko somanahay a balo i boyo', kay ono balo no swantin. ano masoaw kiso, taneng kiso mitanam kya papah, cilemin. adidi' ko balo. mocolil i zazan no boyo'sa, ano maazih somanahay a balo, izaw to ko swantin ipabaw. ano masepi kiso, taneng kiso maazih kolemi tanaya' a heci. mapela' ko heci sa, mabahel to ko sibanohay a sapaloma, katokoh i lala'. o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay o solit no zoma a kamo-Holam ato Amilika
